pageProps.content: ## Overview of Ballerina Swan Lake Update 4 (2201.4.3) Swan Lake 2201.4.3 is the third patch release of Ballerina 2201.4.0 (Swan Lake Update 4) and it includes security improvements. ## Update Ballerina Run the command below to update your current Ballerina installation directly to 2201.4.3 by using the [Ballerina Update Tool](/learn/update-tool/). ``` $ bal dist pull 2201.4.3 ``` ## Install Ballerina If you have not installed Ballerina, download the [installers](/downloads/#swanlake) to install.
